content:
Not sure where to bring this up, but https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79341 will make cfg(x) also add dfoc(cfg(x)). Is someone interested in looking at the generated docs to make sure they look appropriate? I'd also be interested in feedback on the feature itself, since I expect the standard library to be one of the biggest users.

It needs a rebase for now, but afterwards I can run a try build so you can run x.py doc --stage 0 without having to build rustdoc from source
